name: Miratope
description: A renderer for polytopes. Still in alpha.

scripts._bbu: mkdir ./out && echo Running Browserify + Babelify + Uglify... && browserify src/js/main.js -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] ] | uglifyjs -c toplevel,sequences=true,conditionals=true,booleans=true,if_return=true,join_vars=true,drop_console=true -m > out/main.js && echo Browserify + Babelify + Uglify Done!
scripts._b: mkdir ./out && echo Running Browserify... && browserify src/js/main.js -o out/main.js --debug && echo Browserify Done!
scripts._c: echo Copying index.html to the project root folder... && copyfiles -u 1 src/index.html ./ && echo Copying Done!
scripts._h: echo Running HTMLMinifier... && html-minifier --input-dir src --output-dir ./ --file-ext html --minify-js true --minify-css true --minify-urls true --remove-comments --collapse-whitespace && echo HTMLMinifier [main page] Done!
scripts._htypedoc: echo Running HTMLMinifier... && html-minifier --input-dir out/typedoc --output-dir out/typedoc --file-ext html --minify-js true --minify-css true --minify-urls true --remove-comments --collapse-whitespace && echo HTMLMinifier [docs] Done!
scripts.build: npm run tsc && npm run _bbu && npm run _h
scripts.debug: npm run tsc && npm run _b && npm run _c
scripts.typedoc: echo Running TypeDoc... && typedoc src/ts && npm run _htypedoc
scripts.eslint: echo Running ESLint... && eslint src/ts/**/*.ts{,x} --fix && echo ESLint Done!
scripts.tsc: echo Running TypeScript... && tsc && echo TypeScript Done!
scripts.fullbuild: npm run eslint && npm run build && npm run typedoc

author: Miratope authors
